It arrives in several colourways and showcases a regular fit, while a round neckline, straight hem and short sleeves complete the understated design. description:
Courtesy of the Kem collection, these check suit trousers are certainly ticking all the sartorial boxes. Arriving in a rich navy blue colourway that’s marked by a subtle, barely-there all-over check motif, these trousers are perfect for injecting a touch of colour into your selection of smart ensembles. They’re cut to a tailored, straight leg silhouette with a mid-rise waist, concealed front fastening and belt loops. Side pockets are accompanied by jetted rear pockets for a functional touch and pressed creases define both legs for a nod to traditional sartorial cues. Arriving in a rich, inky blue colourway, this navy blazer features a subtle all-over check pattern for an intriguing element that kicks the design up a notch or two, while it’s structured to a classic silhouette with peak lapels, long sleeves and single-breasted button fastenings. title: Quarter Zip Textured T-shirt
subtitle: Even the classic tee needs a contemporary twist at times
description: What would we be without a classic tee? We’re musing over such a thought and choosing to ignore. An understated look, the backbone of casual attire - anyone who disagrees is probably just a liar. So, we’re always thrilled to add another to our collection, and this quarter zip textured T-shirt certainly has our affection. It’s made from a mixed cotton blend, which helps offer comfort to no end, while the textured design is just oh so fine. A round neck and silver-tone zip fastening feature to make this top the most wonderful creature, and finally, short sleeves and a straight hem catapults the style into a relaxed looking gem. Look at that, we’re a poet and we don’t even know it.Material Composition: Cotton 50%  Polyester 50%
